title: University of the Arts London
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922091359/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Education](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922091359/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Education) : The University of the Arts London**

The University of the Arts London was until recently called the [London Institute](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922091359/http:/typophile.com/wiki/London%20Institute).

It consists of five colleges:  
 [London College of Communication](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922091359/http:/typophile.com/wiki/London%20College%20of%20Communication) (formerly the [London College of Printing](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922091359/http:/typophile.com/wiki/London%20College%20of%20Printing))  
 [Camberwell Collge of Arts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922091359/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Camberwell%20Collge%20of%20Arts)  
 [Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922091359/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Central%20Saint%20Martins%20College%20of%20Art%20and%20Design)  
 [Chelsea College of Art and Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922091359/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Chelsea%20College%20of%20Art%20and%20Design)  
 [London College of Fashion](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922091359/http:/typophile.com/wiki/London%20College%20of%20Fashion)
author: filip blazek
